comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Thunderbird/3.1.9

Steps to reproduce:

1)  Open the address book manager, and create an address book with an empty mailing list.
2)  Delete the address book
3)  Create another new address book

What happens:

The mailing list that was created in (1) appears in the new address book in (3)

What is expected:

The mailing list should not appear again, as it was deleted with the address book in (1)
comments.creator: mconley@mozilla.com
